title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 5 Lots of fun crypto collectibles up for auction LOT 1: 2021-A BCmint.com #042, unopenedMore information and pictures of the coin: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5350007LOT 2: 2022 Cypher Hodl coin #47, loaded with 0.0001 btc and an NFT.*Address strip with both addresses will be supplied to the winnerLOT 3: LynxArt "Dollars" cigarette-style box #21/49, unassembledLOT 4: BitcoinPenny mixed lot:2018 MC BitcoinPenny/MantisCryptos2019 AMD BitcoinPenny DIY assembled with just hologram 2020 MGHB BitoinPenny2017 IRIE BitcoinPenny DIY2018 DSC BitcoinPenny (Specially made for the 2018 Dallas Super Con)2018 HGW BitcoinPenny InvisibleLOT 5: 2018 WorldCryptoCon swag pack. Comes with "Bobby Lee" autographed badge.LOT 1:LOT 2:LOT 3:LOT 4:LOT 5:STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: NOVEMBER 14th, 2022, 15:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
